DOC.brief_summary: To compare durability viral load response follow 48 week treatment 1592U89/lamivudine ( 3TC ) /zidovudine ( ZDV ) versus 3TC/ZDV alone . To compare early antiviral activity follow 16 week treatment 1592U89/3TC/ZDV versus 3TC/ZDV alone demonstrated proportion subject viral load < 400 copies/ml , plasma HIV-1 RNA profile CD4+ profile . To assess safety tolerance follow 16 48 week treatment 1592U89/3TC/ZDV versus 3TC/ZDV alone .
DOC.brief_title: The Safety Effectiveness Lamivudine Plus Zidovudine , Used With Without 1592U89 , HIV-1 Infected Patients Who Have Never Taken Anti-HIV Drugs
DOC.detailed_description: This study compare safety efficacy 1592U89 combination 3TC ZDV versus control therapy 3TC ZDV alone .
